attributes.action: stop unmarked and covert stealth speed cameras being used for enforcment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the use of unmarked and stealth cameras is becoming more wipespread. these cameras will not stop accidents by simply issuing fines. if these tactics are to be used the offenders should be stopped by marked traffic police and given advice on their driving or summond to attend a speed awareness course. these unmarked cameras should not be authorised to issue fines and points, this would raise awareness of road safety and improve police/public relations, rather than just raising cash.
